description: '''Borknagar''' is a Norwegian [[progressive metal]] band with [[black metal]] and [[Folk metal|folk]] influences. It was founded in [[Bergen, Norway|Bergen]] in 1995 by [[Ã˜ystein Garnes Brun]] primarily as a black metal band before later switching to a more melodic and progressive style. Borknagar's lyrics often deal with [[philosophy]], [[paganism]], [[nature]] and the [[Universe|cosmos]]. The band has released twelve studio albums.
